message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm offering you a generous 30% to avoid further complications.
I'm not interested in a 30/70 split. This is closer to a fair split, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting you more than me. This offer is fair and avoids further losses for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than a 40/60 split. This is a fair offer, considering the inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Inflation is eating away at your share far quicker than mine.  I'm offering a compromise at 55/45 - take it before it's too late!
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a better deal than 45/55. We can both get more if we compromise.
Bob, this is my final offer. 52.5% for me.  You're running out of time and the value is disappearing fast.  Don't let greed leave us with nothing!
